title: Luxury living at IMT BelaSera at Sherman Way! 2 BD / 2 BA available!
posting_body: ['IMT BelaSera at Sherman Way', 'Bedroom: 2 | Bathroom: 2', 'Square Footage: 1120 sq ft', 'Monthly Rent: $2945', 'show contact info', 'Community Description', '**Walk-ins welcome & choose from 3 tour options.', '**', 'Discover the beauty of IMT BelaSera at Sherman Way.', 'Conveniently located in the heart of San Fernando Valley, these elegant apartment homes with classic Mediterranean architecture are the perfect residences to call home.', 'Thoughtfully designed floor plans, quality craftsmanship and a wealth of distinctive finishes and details offer the finest in both style and comfort.', 'Please call to ask about our next available unit!', 'Community Amenities', '➢ Accepts Electronic Payments', '➢ Assigned Parking', '➢ Controlled Access', '➢ Courtyard', '➢ Elevator', '➢ Emergency Maintenance', '➢ Gated Parking', '➢ High-Speed Internet Available', '➢ On-line Maintenance Request', '➢ Pet Friendly', '➢ BBQ & Courtyard Area', '➢ Classic Mediterranean Architecture', '➢ Controlled Access Subterranean Garage', '➢ Convenient Trash Chute on Each Floor', '➢ Courtyard Fountains', '➢ Online Resident Services', '➢ Professionally Landscaped Grounds with Tiled Walkways', '➢ Telephone Entry System', 'Unit Features', '➢ Breakfast Bar', '➢ Cable & Satellite Ready', '➢ Central Heat & Air', '➢ Formal Dining Area', '➢ Granite Countertops', '➢ High-Speed Internet Available', '➢ Individual Security Systems', '➢ Private Patio/Balcony', '➢ Closets Feature Custom Shelving', '➢ Custom Maple Cabinetry', '➢ Decorative Doors & Baseboards', '➢ Fully Equipped Kitchen with Whirlpool Appliances', '➢ Two-Tone Designer Paint', '➢ Upgraded Fixtures & Hardware', '➢ Washer & Dryer', '➢ Wood-Inspired Floors', 'Contact Information', 'Visit Us:', '19145 Sherman Way', 'Reseda, CA 91335', 'show contact info', 'Hours:', 'Mon - Fri: 9:30 AM - 6:00 PM', 'Website:', '<URL>', 'Additional Details', 'Pet Policy:', 'Breed Restriction Pet Deposit: $500.', 'Pet Rent: $50 Per Month, Per Pet.', 'Maximum 2 pets.', 'No Weight Restriction, Breed Restrictions Apply.', 'Lease Terms:', '12-Month', 'Management Company:', 'IMT Residential', 'Price is subject to change without prior notice', 'EQUAL HOUSING OPPORTUNITY', '025B8768C9704C5']
